amendment.description: To provide for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on the legislative day of Tuesday, July 29, 2003.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1540 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1540 proposed by Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S10874; text: CR S10874) To provide for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on the legislative day of Tuesday, July 29, 2003.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1540 proposed by Senator Frist.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1540 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
